text: :This article is about a village in the french department Tart-et-Garonne. Other meanings are at Valence Valence is a village in the Occitanie region of France. It is in the department Tarn-et-Garonne. In 1999, about 4800 people lived there. Together with 23 other, similar villages, it formed the Communaut√© de communes des Deux Rives. In that structure (that is, in all the villages together) there are about 15.500 people. Valence is located 25 km from Agen, 45 km from Montauban, 60 km from Cahors, 90 km from Toulouse and 160 km from Bordeaux Category:Communes in Tarn-et-Garonne
title: Valence (Tarn-et-Garonne)
